title: Stones hurled at Moratuwa Mayor’s residence
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); News 1st correspondents have reported that stones were hurled at the residence of Moratuwa Mayor Saman Lal Fernando by protestors.
Police was called into control the situation with regard to the protests currently underway at Galle Road in Moratuwa.
Who’s the real mastermind behind Thursday’s (31) violence ? – Manusha
Those who incited violence during Mirihana Protests are political extremists – Govt Min.
